name: Blossom (sunnyhighhill)
description:
Help all the flowers to blossom and save the backyard in this Physics-based shooting puzzle game!

This game was our entry for GameMaker's Toolkit Jam 2018.

As the theme was "GENRE, but you can’t MECHANIC", we took out the main mechanics from shooting games: controlling angle and force of shooting.

[Our team]

Henrique B. Galati: Art/Music/Programming

Rafael Tarina: Game Designer/Level Designer

[Extra Credits]

Boing sound effect by Alexander under CC BY-NC 4.0 (http://www.orangefreesounds.com/boing-sound/)
